get.summary: Get a list of engagements. This endpoint implements OData (Open Data Protocol).
Get a list of engagements for a specific study.
Get instance details

Gets the topology of this Clinical Conductor's environment. When called from a linked CCE it will return the 
information related to the Enterprise instance as well as the the linked CCS instances. When called from a specific
CCS instance, it will return information about the Site instance and shared information from a linked Enterprise, 
but not other Site instances that may be linked with that CCE. When called against a standalone instance, 
it will return only information about that specific instance.

firstName.description: Search will return results where the first name starts with provided value

lastName.description: Search will return results where the lasst name starts with provided value

middleName.description: Search will return results where the middle name starts with provided value

gender.description: Search will return results where the gender matches provided value

phone.description: Search will return results where the any of the phone numbers matches the provided value. Formatting characters will be ignored.

email.description: Search will return results where the any of the email addresses starts with provided value

dateOfBirth.description: Search will return results where the date of birth matches the provided value

zip.description: Search will return results where the zip/postal code starts with the provided value

city.description: Search will return results where the city code starts with the provided value

status.description: Search will return results where the patient status matches the provided value

customFields.description: For each custom field, search will return results where a custom field exists that matches the name and value provided.

patientStudyId.description: Identifier for the patient being paid

patientStudyStatus.description: Status of the patient at the time of the payment

paymentBy.description: Staff responsible for making patient payment

paymentOn.description: Date payment was made. If not provided, current date will be used.

paymentById.description: Staff responsible for making patient payment. If not provided, current user will be used.

checkNumber.description: Check number of payment. This field is required when payment method is check.

sequence.description: Sequence of the visit for the study protocol

appointments.description: List of appointments for the visit

DefaultStaff.description: In order of preference - default to first when setting indicates to select a default

sequence.description: Order of element within the visit

durationMinutes.description: Anticipated duration, in minutes, to complete the element

isRepeatedElement.description: This element instance was a repeat

start.description: Date and time of visit start

end.description: Date and time of visit end

fullName.description: Full name will be split broken up and stored in first and last name components if they are not already provided.

dateOfBirth.description: It is recommended to provide this field in ISO-8601 format
It is recommended to provide this field in ISO-8601 format

staffId.description: Author of the note, if not provided, current user will be used

failureReason.description: Returns the reason that the appointment could not be canceled.

BookAvailableAppointmentRequest.description: Appointment booking information for scheduling an available appointment

appointmentProposalId.description: Id of appointment proposal provided by appointment search

appointmentId.description: Identifier of the appointment if booked successfully

conflictMessage.description: Message specific to any conflicts that occured during booking

fastingRequired.description: Fasting is required for the appointment

fastingHours.description: Number of hours to fast prior to the appointment

interval.description:
The scheduling interval. Appointment blocks will be scheduled in these increments. For example, start appointments
every 15 minutes.

startTimeOfDay.description:
Start time of day to restrict search for appointments. For example, only search for appointments in the morning. 
All times will be considered if left blank.

endTimeOfDay.description: End time of day to search for appointments

daysOfWeek.description: Days of week to search for appointments. All days will be considered if left blank.

optionalElements.description: List of optional element ids to schedule. Only required elements will be scheduled if left blank.

repeatedElements.description: List of repeatable element ids to repeat during scheduling. Nothing will be repeated if left blank.

available.description: Were any appointment times found satisfying the search criteria

appointmentTime.description: Local date and time of the appointment to book

optionalElements.description: List of optional element ids to schedule. Only required elements will be scheduled if left blank.

repeatedElements.description: List of repeatable element ids to repeat during scheduling. Nothing will be repeated if left blank.
